attributes.action: Provide further funding to small business during next lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Look at providing councils with funding to further support ALL non essential businesses that have to close through the business rates relief scheme
attributes.background: Give all small businesses in receipt of SBRR a further Grant During The Next Lockdown

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Since you started your petition, the national lockdown has ended. You could start a new petition calling for changes to business support under the current tiered restrictions, if that's what you'd like to see happen.

You might also like to sign the following petition:

Extend the grants for small business who receive SBRR by a further £5000
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548846
